PHRASE.LANG: An ink stone made of jade.\n A type of stationery which grinds ink with water.[#Legal]
Encrier fait de jade.\nSert à mélanger de l’encre à dessin avec de l’eau.[#Legal]
Aus Jade hergestellter Tuschstein.\nSchreibutensil, auf dem Tinte mit Wasser vermischt wird.[#Legal]
Contenitore realizzato in giada.\nUno strumento per scrivere sciogliendo l'inchiostro nell'acqua. [#Legal]
Un tintero hecho de jade.\nUn instrumento para mezclar tinta de caligrafía con agua.[#Legal]
翡翠で出来た硯。\n墨を水ですりおろす為の文房具。[#Legal]
비취로 만든 벼루. \n먹을 갈아 물을 섞기 위한 문방구.[#Legal]
An ink stone made of jade.\n A type of stationery which grinds ink with water.[#Legal]
以翡翠製成的墨硯。\n能用水來磨墨的文具。[#Legal]
以翡翠製成的墨硯。\n能用水來磨墨的文具。[#Legal]
An ink stone made of jade.\n A type of stationery which grinds ink with water.[#Legal]
